mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, c.ip_address, c.user_id, c.mac_address, c.pc_name, c.os, c.pc_protector_version, c.vaccine_version, c.check_time, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.wrong_md5, c.roles, c.active, c.department_idx FROM client c, user u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND u.department_idx LIKE CONCAT(#{idx}, '%');
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND department_idx = #{departmentIdx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE ip_address = #{value}

SELECT c.idx, c.ip_address, c.user_id, c.mac_address, c.pc_name, c.os, c.pc_protector_version, c.vaccine_version, c.check_time, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.wrong_md5, c.roles, c.active FROM client c, user u WHERE c.user_id = #{id} AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND u.department_idx LIKE CONCAT(#{UserIdx}, '%')
SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM client WHERE user_id = #{value} AND r0 = 1
SELECT * FROM client_history WHERE user_id = #{value} ORDER BY check_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (user_id, ip_address, mac_address, os, pc_protector_version, pc_name, check_time, department_idx, roles) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{macAddress}, #{os}, #{pcProtectorVersion}, #{pcName}, #{checkTime}, #{departmentIdx}, 'CLIENT');

INSERT INTO client_history (user_id, ip_address, mac_address, os, pc_protector_version, pc_name, check_time, roles, department_idx) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{macAddress}, #{os}, #{pcProtectorVersion}, #{pcName}, #{checkTime}, 'CLIENT', #{departmentIdx});
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET os = #{os}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, mac_address = #{macAddress}, pc_name = #{pcName}, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, update_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND department_idx = #{departmentIdx};

UPDATE client_history SET os = #{os}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, mac_address = #{macAddress}, pc_name = #{pcName}, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, check_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND department_idx = #{departmentIdx} ORDER BY check_time DESC LIMIT 1
UPDATE client SET wrong_md5 = true, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, update_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM client WHERE mac_address = #{macAddress} OR user_id = #{userId}
